cyclone.name: BETA
cyclone.current_location: about 220 miles southeast of Galveston, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: forecast to edge slowly west-northwest then northwest and move inland along the central Texas coast before turning north toward Louisiana/Mississippi mid-week
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Texas coast between Port Aransas and High Island

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch south of Port Aransas TX to the Mouth of the Rio Grande
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning Port Aransas TX to Morgan City LA; Storm Surge Warning Port Aransas TX to Rockefeller Wildlife Refuge LA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and upper Texas coast and southwest Louisiana coast
weather_observation.wind: Low risk of tropical-storm-force winds (≤5% chance) with breezy conditions mid-week
weather_observation.storm_surge: Elevated tides and minor surge of 1–3 ft possible along the Mississippi coast, including Pascagoula
weather_observation.rainfall: 3–6 inches of rain possible mid-week could cause localized flooding
weather_observation.other_hazards: Hazardous surf and rip currents through the period
